_sText:
This is a gun making gun shop/working gun shop.
You can get a weapon from it by shooting at one of the weapon models behind the shop merchant(The Combine).
Example: if i want an awp, I just shoot at the awp weapon model, hten a working awp appears in front of me.
And as an extra i have given the combine an animation so it looks like he gives me the gun.
Included guns: Awp, Scout, Ak-47, M4a1, deagle and five-seven.

Hope you guys like it :D

-Chillinut
